utilities
Class BluetoothTransmission

java.lang.Object
  utilities.BluetoothTransmission

public class BluetoothTransmission
extends java.lang.Object

This class will open a bluetooth connection to the PC server. It will also read the match variables and set the appropriate variables in Settings.

Field Summary
(package private) static java.io.DataInputStream stream
          Input Data Stream

Method Summary
static void catchBug(java.lang.String bug)
          The static helper method here just exits the system when commanded.
private static void close()
          Closes the connection to the server
static void getBluetoothData()
          Calls getConnection() and then getInformation().
private static java.io.DataInputStream getConnection()
          Waits for a bluetooth connection to the server, and when one becomes available it will connect.
private static void getInformation()
          Reads the input stream for information, it will then set Settings.role, Settings.startingCorner, Settings.greenZoneCoords, and Settings.redZoneCoords

Method Detail

getBluetoothData

public static void getBluetoothData()
Calls getConnection() and then getInformation(). It will then call close

getConnection

private static java.io.DataInputStream getConnection()
Waits for a bluetooth connection to the server, and when one becomes available it will connect.

Returns:

close

private static void close()
Closes the connection to the server

getInformation

private static void getInformation()
Reads the input stream for information, it will then set Settings.role, Settings.startingCorner, Settings.greenZoneCoords, and Settings.redZoneCoords

catchBug

public static void catchBug(java.lang.String bug)
The static helper method here just exits the system when commanded. It displays a message on the NXT for the user.

Parameters:
bug - A String object with the message on screen.
